channel.title: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAWWWWW YEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEESSSSSSSSSSSS
channel.description:
I'm a MAJOR fan of the entire Castlevania series which, unfortunately, have failed to deliver the same quality of games as they used to. I started playing Symphony of the Night when I was around 8 and I couldn't drop the game for anything longer than a month; I've played it on the PS1, ported to my cracked PSP and played the unlockable version on the official PSP game and I still find secrets I didn't know back then.
Now, after all these years, my friend comes up to me and shows me this: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/iga/bloodstained-ritual-of-the-night
HOLY FUCK
